title: Drawing, "Study: Pink Begonia", early 20th century
medium: Brush and watercolor on gray paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 24
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting a begonia plant with pale pink blossoms and green leaves with touches of red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study: Pink Begonia", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Brush and watercolor on gray paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-17.
